intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Warm engine first for complete drain. Sportster uses a separate oil tank.
intervals.torque_spec: Drain plug: 14-21 lb-ft (19-28 Nm), Oil filter: hand-tight plus 1/2 turn
intervals.fluid_spec: 20W-50 (Screamin Eagle SYN3 or equivalent V-twin oil) — 2.8 qt with filter

intervals.description: Drain and replace primary chaincase lubricant. Check primary chain tension and compensator sprocket.
intervals.fluid_spec: Harley-Davidson Formula+ or Sportster Primary Oil — 32 oz (1 qt)

intervals.description: Drain and replace transmission lubricant. Inspect for metal shavings on drain plug magnet.
Replace spark plugs. Inspect electrode condition and porcelain insulator color for mixture clues.
Replace air filter element. Clean and re-oil if using reusable filter. Check for carb/intake leaks.
Check and adjust pushrod valve clearances on both cylinders. Engine must be stone cold.
Inspect drive belt for cracks, fraying, or missing teeth. Check belt tension and alignment.
intervals.fluid_spec: Belt deflection: 5/16-3/8 in (8-10 mm) at midpoint

intervals.description: Replace drive belt. Inspect rear pulley and front sprocket for wear. Verify alignment after install.
Replace front and rear brake fluid. Bleed system completely until fluid runs clear.
Check front and rear brake pad wear. Replace when pad material is at minimum thickness.
Replace front fork oil. Inspect fork seals and bushings for leaks.
intervals.fluid_spec: Type E fork oil — 10.4 oz (310ml) per leg

intervals.description: Check battery terminals for corrosion. Test battery voltage (12.6V resting) and charging system output (13.5-14.5V at 2000 RPM).
